contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|BIA}} '''BIA''' or '''Bia''' may refer to: == Acronym == * [[Bureau of Indian Affairs]], a US government agency * [[Board of Immigration Appeals]], a US government agency * The IATA airport code for [[Bastia - Poretta Airport]], or, informally: ** [[Bandaranaike International Airport]] ("CMB") ** [[Baghdad International Airport]] (IATA airport code "SDA") ** [[Bahrain International Airport]] ("BAH") ** [[Suvarnabhumi Airport|Bangkok International Airport]], officially named "Suvarnabhumi Airport" ("BKK") ** [[Beirut International Airport]] ("BEY") ** [[Belfast International Airport]] ("BFS") ** [[Bengaluru International Airport]] ("BLR") ** [[Blackpool International Airport]] ("BLK") ** [[Bangor International Airport]], Bangor, Maine ("BGR") ** [[Bristol Airport]] ("BRS") * [[Bus Industries of America]] * [[police psychology#Organizations|Behavioural investigative advisor]], a UK term for police psychologist * [[Security Information Agency|Bezbednosno Informativna Agencija]], a Serbian intelligence agency * [[Bilateral Immunity Agreement]], a type of treaty involving the United States * [[MAC address|Burned-in address]], a globally unique network address assigned to a device at time of manufacture * [[Board of Immigration Appeals]], a US immigration appellate court * [[Bohemia Interactive Australia]], a computer simulation software company * [[Braille Institute of America]], a non-profit organization headquartered in Los Angeles * [[British Island Airways]], a defunct UK airline * [[Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30|Brothers in Arms]], a video game * [[Bioelectrical impedance analysis]], a way to measure body fat using electrical impulses * [[Border and Immigration Agency]], a defunct UK government agency * [[Burma Independence Army]], a name for the predecessor of the Burma National Army in World War II * [[Business impact analysis]], a component of business continuity planning * [[Business improvement area]], a defined area within which businesses pay an additional tax or fee in order to fund improvements within the area * [[Basic indicator approach]], a set of operational risk measurement techniques for banking institutions * [[Bankruptcy and Insolvency Act]], the statute that regulates the law on bankruptcy and insolvency in Canada * [[Business/IT alignment]], a dynamic state in which a business organization is able to use information technology (IT) effectively to achieve business objectives == Surname == * [[Maria Francisca Bia]], 19th-century Dutch ballet dancer, opera singer and actress == Word == * ''Bia'', a former plant genus now considered synonymous with ''[[Tragia]]'' * ''Bia'' (also spelled ''Biya''), a Filipino name for the [[Long-finned goby]] * [[Bia de' Medici]] * [[BÃ¯a]], a Brazilian-born singer * [[Bia (butterfly)|''Bia'' (butterfly)]], a genus of brush-footed butterflies * [[Bia (mythology)]], a Greek mythological figure * [[Phou Bia]], the highest mountain in Laos * [[Bia National Park]], a national part in Ghana * [[Bia River]] in western Africa * [[Bia, Togo]] {{disambiguation}}
